alert.note: Alert for East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:58AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 145 AM MST... At 1258 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 12 miles west of Casa Grande, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Firebird Lake, Stanfield, Ak- Chin Village and Mobile. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 163 and 178. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 157 and 167. AZ Route 202 near mile marker 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; West Pinal County
